text: "Young'n (Holla Back)" is the second single from Fabolous' debut album Ghetto Fabolous. It peaked at number thirty-three on the Billboard Hot 100 and number seventeen on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks.[] The song was also used in much promotion material for the popular video game Need For Speed: Underground, and was featured as soundtrack in the game's Game demo but was seemingly removed from the final cut. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Charts (2001–02) ! title: Young'n (Holla Back)
